message:
Hi people, 
Wish I knew all you fine folks, I recently joined the Cru staff and mission here at the U. 
We have an open door to do world missions right here on campus! 
Students are here from many nations! 

One way is to offer to be a conversation partner with a class mate who speaks English as a 2nd language!

The commitment to be a conversation partner includes:
Meeting up twice a month with your partner
Having the desire and margin to spend time with your partner outside of your 2 meetings
Attending a conversation partner training once a semester

If you have any questions about the role or commitment please ask me or Jen Berglund Eggers. 

Here is the sign up form. Please respond by Sunday: https://goo.gl/forms/w5WlKePD0VgjzC7N2

Another opportunity!

Hindu Training/ outreach to students from India

Bonus announcement: ISM (the ministries that put on English Club including Cru) have a guest speaker coming to teach about ministering to Hindu /Indian students.
It will be September 24th at 
5:30 -7pm at Stadium Village Church. 
You and your friends are welcome!

Questions..Frank 612-221-0924
